name: FlokiSanta
description: What is the project about? FlokiSanta was created to make history at Christmas! In this direction, Floki Santa will build the SantaVERSE universe and the FlokiSanta app into a long-term ecosystem. What makes your project unique? FlokiSanta is building a metaverse-based ecosystem. The name of our universe is SantaVERSE. NFTs and the Metaverse are still in development, and many large investors have entered the game. We aim to take a big place in this market. History of your project. We wrote a great story last year under the name SantaFloki. Over the past year, we have been designing and working to turn this into a long-term project. We have been working on developing a large metaverse-based ecosystem for a year. In this direction, we changed our name to increase brand value and we are here as FlokiSanta. Whatâ€™s next for your project? A very clean and realistic roadmap has been prepared. First of all, we would like to complete our listings in order to ensure financial price stability and strengthen the community. In the background, the development of the FlokiSantaVERSE continues. In short, our first steps will be exchange listings and FlokiSantaVERSE. What can your token be used for? FlokiSantaVERSE is an ecosystem built on artificial intelligence-based NFTs. Every NFT in this ecosystem will be special and unique to users. NFTs and entry permission are needed to take part in our ecosystem. FLOKIS token is used for this.
